speculation_rules.label: Speculation Rules API
speculation_rules.comment:
What are Speculation Rules?
The Speculation Rules API allows browsers to prefetch or prerender pages before users click on them, significantly improving navigation speed.

How it works:
‚Ä¢ Prefetch: Downloads page resources in advance (lower resource usage)
‚Ä¢ Prerender: Fully renders the page in background (faster but uses more resources)

Eagerness levels control when speculation triggers:
‚Ä¢ Eager: Immediately when the page loads
‚Ä¢ Moderate: After 200ms hover over the link
‚Ä¢ Conservative: On mouse/touch down (just before click)

eager_prefetch_selectors.label: Eager Prefetch - CSS Selectors
eager_prefetch_selectors.comment:
Links matching these selectors will be prefetched immediately when the page loads.
Enter one CSS selector per line.

‚ö†Ô∏è Use sparingly: Too many eager rules can slow down the current page.

eager_prerender_selectors.label: Eager Prerender - CSS Selectors
eager_prerender_selectors.comment:
Links matching these selectors will be prerendered immediately when the page loads.
Enter one CSS selector per line.

Use very sparingly: High resource usage, only for critical pages

‚ö†Ô∏è Caution: Can significantly impact performance. Use only for most critical pages.

moderate_prefetch_selectors.label: Moderate Prefetch - CSS Selectors
moderate_prefetch_selectors.comment:
Links matching these selectors will be prefetched after hovering for 200ms.
Enter one CSS selector per line.

moderate_prerender_selectors.label: Moderate Prerender - CSS Selectors
moderate_prerender_selectors.comment:
Links matching these selectors will be prerendered after hovering for 200ms.
Enter one CSS selector per line.

üí° Balanced approach: Good performance boost with moderate resource usage.

conservative_prefetch_selectors.label: Conservative Prefetch - CSS Selectors
conservative_prefetch_selectors.comment:
Links matching these selectors will be prefetched on mouse/touch down (just before click).
Enter one CSS selector per line.

conservative_prerender_selectors.label: Conservative Prerender - CSS Selectors
conservative_prerender_selectors.comment:
Links matching these selectors will be prerendered on mouse/touch down (just before click).
Enter one CSS selector per line.

‚úÖ Minimal risk: Very low performance impact, safe to use broadly.
